meta_description: The Tu Voto Decide application is a citizen initiative led by Asoblockchain Bolivia, with technical development by Blockchain Consultora, whose objective is to conduct electoral control using Blockchain technology, based on the electoral vote counting records applied for the first time in the general elections of Bolivia 2025.

paragraphs: In a context where trust in electoral processes is fundamental, Tu Voto Decide emerges as a blockchain-based solution for citizen monitoring.

This application allows users to create a sovereign digital identity integrated with the Wira Wallet ecosystem. Individuals register by validating their information through artificial intelligence, which compares a selfie with official data. Once the identity is registered, users can capture photos of electoral records, sign them electronically and convert them into NFTs to ensure their authenticity.

Other participants download these records to validate them, and the results are consolidated on the blockchain, offering unalterable transparency. The pilot will be launched in the general elections of Bolivia 2025, with emphasis on the second round, and will expand to municipal, national and international levels for institutions that require secure electronic voting.

features.title: Main Features
features.description: Explore the tools that make possible an empowered and verifiable citizen electoral control.
features.description1: Register securely with AI validation, creating an identity protected by smart contracts, part of the Wira Wallet ecosystem.
features.description2: Capture and electronically sign electoral records, converting them into non-fungible tokens that guarantee immutability and easy validation by the community.
features.description3: Access consolidated results backed by blockchain, with visualizations of use and authenticity for transparent monitoring in elections.

app.title: Why participate?
app.description: The electoral control application is part of the digital identity ecosystem of the Wira Wallet application, so by using it you already acquire some benefits.

benefits.content: You acquire sovereign digital identity, with which to sign in other processes.
By obtaining captures of the records, you acquire an NFT as a certificate of your participation.
If you attest truthfully, you acquire Wira and Asoblockchain tokens.
You acquire a self-custody wallet for your cryptos.
You can benefit from the features of the Wira wallet.
